sqlMap.select: SELECT FC_NM fcNm , FC_CONTENT fcContent , FC_DATE fcDate , FC_TYPE fcType , FREE_NM freeNm ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID ) fcWriter FROM FREE_COMMENT WHERE FREE_NM = #freeNm#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_COMMENT( FC_NM , FC_CONTENT , FC_DATE , FC_TYPE , FREE_NM , USER_ID VALUES ( FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL #fcContent# SYSDATE #fcType# #freeNm# #fcWriter# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FREE_COMMENT SET FC_CONTENT = #fcContent# , FC_DATE = SYSDATE , FC_TYPE = #fcType# WHERE FC_NM = #fcNm# AND FREE_NM = #freeNm#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FREE_COMMENT WHERE FC_NM = #fcNm# AND FREE_NM = #freeNm#
